roles.name: Security Officer
roles.description: On-site security officers — often referred to simply as guards — at Foundation facilities are tasked with maintaining physical and information security for Foundation projects, operations, and personnel.

roles.name: MTF - Mobile Task Force
roles.description: Specialist units comprised of veteran field personnel drawn from all over the Foundation.

roles.name: Class D
roles.description: Class D personnel are expendable personnel used to handle extremely hazardous anomalies. Typically drawn worldwide from the ranks of prison inmates convicted of violent crimes, especially those on death row.

roles.name: SCP-173
roles.description: Euclid. Made of concrete and rebar. Extremely hostile. Cannot move within line of sight, but will attack and snap the neck when not watched.
